headline.main: FINNS' RADIO SEES END OF WAR NEAR; Fixing of New Frontier Must Await Final Peace, Asserts Helsinki Broadcaster

lead_paragraph: HELSINKI, Finland, Nov. 6 -- "Military operations are drawing to a close, as far as our country is concerned," the Finnish radio announced tonight.
abstract: Finnish radio sees end of Finnish-USSR war
snippet: HELSINKI, Finland, Nov. 6 -- "Military operations are drawing to a close, as far as our country is concerned," the Finnish radio announced tonight....
